summary: In this context, butan-1-ol is discussed in relation to its oxidation process using various catalytic systems, particularly the V2O5â€“WO3/TiO2 catalyst. The study focuses on the catalytic oxidation of butan-1-ol, comparing its activation energy with other volatile organic compounds (VOCs). This indicates a direct relationship where the oxidation of butan-1-ol is a key aspect of the research, highlighting its significance in catalytic studies.
